channel.title: Dragon Plate
channel.description: Anyone Know How to add it to server? :|

item.title: Dragon Plate
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

Well, first you must get a D Plate model - add it to your Models folder. [Client-side] (the model must be a gZip file [ends with .gz]
Then rerun your client, log in to any server and type “add model ####” [#### stands for model number]
To get the D Plate, you should have something like this too:

if(i == 16053){ class8.aString170 = "Saradomin godsword(dual)"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Possibly the most powerful weapon ever.".getBytes(); class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt174 = 13700;//inventory/drop model ID class8.anInt165 = 13699;//male equip class8.anInt200 = 13699;//female equip }
I took Galkons Dual SGS’es as example.

Add D Plate’s stuff in class8.java - close and compile.

Then add something like this into your item.cfg [server-side]

item = #### Saradomin_godsword(dual) A_Dragon_Platebody. 88000000.2105575155 88000000.2105575155 1320000.3495290539 -4 112 100 -4 0 0 0 0 -1 113 160 0

stands for the ItemID.

Save and run your client and server and log in - ::pickup #### 1 … Hope this helped and you can understand it.

Read full topic
